name: Plick Reborn
description:
Plick Reborn is an arcade game where the player must catch drops using an incredible and futuristic tool: a saucepan.
It contains several gameplays, some of them can be purchased using coins collected in each level.
Plick Reborn can be connected to Google Play Services to activate achievements and worldwide leaderboards.
This game is completely free of mandatory viewing ads and other type of banners. All promotional videos offered can be skipped or watched in exchange for game coins.
Beautiful, simple, easy to play and, of course, indie ;)
